item.title: Whale Song Delayed - New Technology
item.description: A short update on my whale song project: it’s shifting technology.

item.title: Whale Song Update
item.description: A short update on my whale song project: it’s delayed. Need to sort out some legal stuff.

item.title: Whale Song - Some Background
item.description: Recent press about an actual conversation with a whale was preceeded by ground-breaking work by Dr. Michelle Fournet and profiled in the fantastic documentary Fathom on AppleTV. This is a MUST WATCH if you love the ocean - or humanity!
